paragraph: Any one can invest the minium amount Rs 10,000 and multiple of 50,000
s2: They will can return 6% ROI P/M on their investment /72% P/A
s3: The return on investment will be credited in to your account on 15th of every month
s4: Any one can withdraw their investment at any time within in a three month of notice period
s5: We will provide the cheque leaf of our company to security for your investment
